actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing an item veto in appropriations.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Allows the President an item veto of appropriations bills. Requires the President, in signing such a bill, to designate the provisions disapproved and return the bill to the House in which it originated. Subjects such bills to the same proceedings as other bills disapproved by the President.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing an item veto in appropriations.
